gadgets.name: Ring Laser
gadgets.description: A miniature tool laser built into a finger ring. While the laser is too weak to serve as a weapon, it is useful for small cutting or welding jobs. The ring includes a battery with enough powder for up to 10 minutes of continued operation. It can, however, be used as a painful intimidation device.
gadgets.special: Allows the Traveller to perform small cutting or welding jobs, or inflict pain on a creature.

gadgets.name: Wrist Watch
gadgets.special: Allows the Traveller to know the time.

gadgets.name: Wrist Watch
gadgets.description: A simple timepiece. A variety of gimmicky 'survival watches' and 'space crew chronometers' are available. Some contain reasonably useful accessories but most are suitable only as gifts to be given by misguided but well-meaning relatives.

gadgets.name: Wrist Watch (Prestige)
gadgets.description: A 'Prestige' timepiece. Does little more than look good while keeping time.
